name: Bribe
description:
You are a president, who needs to spend all their bribe money. You have many luxury options to buy — however, laundering takes time, and you can't live forever. Can you handle such a responsibility?

This game is part of Eva Enta's Gaming Alphabet — a collection of short, themed, gameplay-narrative games (for now — just prototypes). Here is the full list:

  • Apathy
  • Bribe
  • Cohabitation [in development]
  • [in development]
